item.title: First Post
item.description: Welcome to my blog! I created this website using the Hugo theme Hermit and I plan to use it to document my projects both extracurricular and in class. I have many projects planned this summer and will be frequently posting about them here!

item.title: Projects
item.description: Overview This is where I will keep track of my completed projects (in reverse chronological order), with broad explanations of their development process as well as links to their respective git repositories. “Spidey” Web Server Gitlab: cse-20289-sp20-project (private repository) This was the final project for my Systems Programming course in the Spring of 2020. The project entailed the creation of a functional web server (called spidey) writtten in C which can handle multiple requests at atime and perform file directory, and cgi requests.

item.title: About Me
item.description: I am an undergraduate Computer Science major at the University of Notre Dame, graduating in 2022. When I am not in class or doing homework you can most likely find me at water polo practice, reading, or writing. I am a very dedicated, hardworking individual and am always eager to learn new things. You can reach me via email at mlee43@nd.edu
